rgb(255,0,0): Move the pointer to the right
rgb(0,255,0): Output the character signified by the cell at the pointer
rgb(0,0,255): Move the pointer to the left
rgb(255,255,0): Increment the memory cell at the pointer
rgb(0,255,255): Decrement the memory cell at the pointer
rgb(255,0,188): Jump past the matching ] if the cell at the pointer is 0
rgb(255,128,0): Jump back to the matching [ if the cell at the pointer is nonzero
rgb(102,0,204): Input a character and store it in the cell at the pointer
